meanings.sent1: She moved supplely through the dance routine.
meanings.sent2: He stretched supplely before starting his workout.
meanings.sent3: The cat leaped supplely onto the windowsill, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed supplely around the rocks, like a silk ribbon.
meanings.sent5: The gymnast twisted supplely in mid-air, impressing the judges.

meanings.definition: Capable of bending easily without breaking
meanings.sent1: The rubber band was so supplely that it could stretch without snapping.
meanings.sent2: The leather was supplely enough to be crafted into intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The supplely tree branches swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was supplely, able to adapt to new ideas effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's supplely movements captivated the audience.

meanings.definition: Able to move and bend easily and gracefully
meanings.sent1: The acrobat performed supplely, twisting and turning in the air.
meanings.sent2: The yoga instructor demonstrated how to move supplely into each pose.
meanings.sent3: The supplely cat arched its back and stretched lazily.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was supplely, able to reach high notes with ease.
meanings.sent5: The fabric draped supplely over the mannequin, showcasing its flexibility.
